SA01n759:921: kasyāṃ punargatau kati kuśalāścākuśalāśca karmapathāḥ saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgato vā santīti ?
SA01n759:925: ete trayaḥ saṃbhinnapralāpapārūṣyavyāpādā nārake [saṃmukhībhāva] taḥ samanvāgamataśca vidyante |
SA01n759:927: kecitkhalu bruvate-abhighyā mithyādṛṣṭiścāpi dvābhyāṃ prakārābhyāṃ vidyete |
SA01n759:935: anye punarāhuḥ-samānvāgamata eva na saṃmukhībhāvataḥ amamāparigrahatvāt,
SA01n759:938: narakottarakurubhyāṃ kāmadhātau dvābhyāṃ prakārābhyāṃ daśāśubhā vidyante |
SA01n759:941: trayo'nabhidhyā'vyāpādasamyagdṛṣṭayaḥ sarvatra traidhātuke pañcasvapi gatiṣu dvābhyāṃ prakārābhyāṃ santīti |
SA01n759:944: dhyānasaṃvareṇa yāvadbhūbhyāśrayaṃ hyanāsravaśīlamārya utpāditanirodhitaṃ kṛtvā ārūpyeṣūpapanno bhavati tenātītena samanvāgato bhavati |
SA01n759:952: anyatra gatau saṃmukhībhāvato hyete sapta kuśalāḥ karmapathā vidyante |
SA01n759:987: yattena parasya duḥkhā vedanā janitā tatonarakeṣūpapadyate |
SA01n759:989: yattejo nāśitaṃ tena bāhyā bhāvāḥ kṛśaujasaḥ |
SA01n759:997: pañca phalānyuktāni teṣāṃ kataratkarma katibhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalam ?
SA01n759:1000: prahāṇamārge samale pañcabhiḥ phalaiḥ karma saphalaṃ bhavati |
SA01n759:1001: tulyā adhikā api tasya paścādutpannāḥ sadaśā dharmā ṇi(ni)
SA01n759:1009: yacca tatprahāṇaṃ tadbalena hi tatprāptyu pattiḥ |
SA01n759:1010: adhipatiphalaṃ svabhāvādanye sarvasaṃskārāḥ pūrvotpanna varjjā iti draṣṭavyam |
SA01n759:1013: yattu nirmalaprahāṇamārge karma taccaturbhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalaṃ vipākaphalaṃ muktvā |
SA01n759:1016: yacca prahāṇamārgādanyatkuśalasāsravaṃ[karmaṃ] yaccākuśalaṃ tadapi caturbhireva phalaiḥ saphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalaṃ tyaktvā ||
SA01n759:1021: phalaṃ śubhasya catvāri dve trīṇi ca śubhādayaḥ ||
SA01n759:1022: kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmāścatvāri phalāni vipākaphalaṃ hitvā |
SA01n759:1025: [208] śubhādyāstvaśubhasya dve trīṇi catvāri ca kramāt |
SA01n759:1026: akuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale |
SA01n759:1036: avyākṛtasya te tu dve trīṇi trīṇi śubhādayaḥ ||
SA01n759:1037: avyākṛtasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale |
SA01n759:1045: vartamānāstu dharmā vartamānasya karmaṇaḥ dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale |
SA01n759:1046: ajātasya tvajātā dharmāstrīṇi phalāni niṣyandavisaṃyogaphale hitvā ||
SA01n759:1048: svabhūmikā dharmāḥ karmaṇo yathāsaṃbhavaṃ catvāri phalāni visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā |
SA01n759:1061: [211] ekaṃ trīṇi dvayaṃ caiva śaikṣādyāḥ paścimasya tu |
SA01n759:1063: aśaikṣasya khalu karmaṇaḥ śaikṣā dharmā ekamadhipatiphalam,
SA01n759:1067: naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣāṇāṃ punaḥ śaikṣā dharmā dve puruṣākārādhipatiphale |
SA01n759:1071: [212] trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛṣṭiheyādayaḥ smṛtāḥ |
SA01n759:1078: te tvabhyāsapraheyasya dve catvāri tridhā matāḥ ||
SA01n759:1096: tadyathā citrakara ekayā vartyā katsnaṃ rūpamākṣipati,
SA01n759:1098: atha yaduktaṃ bhagavatā-“karmasvako'yaṃ bhikṣavo lokaḥ” iti |
SA01n759:1103: yatkhalu kāyavāṅmanaskarma svayaṃ kṛtaṃ kuśalākuśalamabhyatītaṃ dadatphalaṃ sā karmasvakatā draṣṭavyā ||
SA01n759:1104: kathaṃ punaḥ pratikṣaṇabhidureṣu saṃskāreṣu parasparākṛtasaṅketeṣu satsu,
SA01n759:1105: asati ca nitye karttari bhoktari ca karmasvakatā'bhidhīyate ?
SA01n759:1108: karttṛtā bhoktṛtā coktā niṣiddhā śāśvatasya tu ||
SA01n759:1112: śāśvate tvātmani niṣkriye pūrvapaścādviśeṣābhāvāt karttṛtvaṃ cātyantāpadhvastayuktividhānam |
SA01n759:1113: skandhasantāne tu viśiṣṭaskandhāntarotpattau satyāṃ bījajalābhiṣekādyanugrahā[d] viśiṣṭaphalotpattivaditi |
SA01n759:1117: syātkhalu karmasvakatā nāpi ca tasya karmaṇo vipāke'vasthita iti catuṣkoṭikā |
SA01n759:1120: yadi tasya karmaṇaḥ phale'vasthitastacca karma vihīnaṃ bhavati ||
SA01n759:1131: syātkhalu karmaṇā samanvāgato na ca tasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ vedayate |
SA01n759:1138: yogavihitamayogavihitaṃ ca karmoktaṃ tasya kiṃ lakṣaṇam ?
SA01n759:1142: yatkiñcitkhalu kliṣṭaṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarma kleśopakleśadūṣitaṃ sarvaṃ tadayogavihitama,
SA01n759:1144: anye punarbruvate-yatkhalu śikṣāvyapetaṃ yathā gantavyaṃ sthātavyamityevamādi,
SA01n759:1145: yattu liṅgavacanahīnamasaṃbaddhaṃ nirarthakaṃ ca vākkarma tadayogavihitam |
SA01n759:1148: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau caturthasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ||
SA01n759:1152: timirotsādanakarīṃ karmasvakatāṃ kaḥ svayamabhisaṃbuddhya lokānugrahāya pradarśayatīti ? brūmaḥ |
SA01n759:1154: sa punaḥ kiṃ cittotpādātprabhṛti bodhisattvo bhavati ?
SA01n759:1160: yataḥ prabhṛti kalyāṇamitraṃ bhagavantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha[māpa]dya tadupadarśitadakṣiṇamārgaḥ yoniśo manasikārādhiṣṭhitabuddhiḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokamatrāṇamaśaraṇamaparāyaṇaṃ pañcagatimahāvarte jātijarāvyādhimaraṇādiduḥkhakṣārāmbhasi,
SA01n759:1166: kāropahatabuddhinayano'yaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā samyagdṛṣṭiprabhāvabhāsitena śīlasaṃkrameṇottārayitavyaḥ |
SA01n759:1167: pratighabhujaṅgadaṃṣṭrā viṣadūṣito'yaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā maitryāgadena praśamitavyaḥ |
SA01n759:1168: tṛṣṇāpiśācīlalitābhibhūtamatirayaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā śamathabalena tṛṣṇānirodhasukhaṃ lambhayitavyaḥ |
SA01n759:1169: parāmarśabhūtagrahāviṣṭo'yaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā vimokṣasukhasvastyayanena nirbhayamamṛtapadaṃ praveśayitavyaḥ |
SA01n759:1170: mānagiriśikharādhirūḍhabuddhirayaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā karmasvakatājñānavajreṇa mānagirīnvicūrṇya praśāntamānamadāmarśaśāntipade sthāpayitavyaḥ |
SA01n759:1171: vicikitsākathaṃkathībhāvaśalyaviddhahṛdayo'yaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā pratītyasamutpādapravicayaśalākayā kāṅkṣāśalyamutpāṭyāmṛtarasaṃ pāyayitavyaḥ |
SA01n759:1172: jarāvyādhimaraṇamakaradaṃṣṭrāntargato'yaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā sarvānarthaviyuktaṃ nirvṛtisukhaṃ prāpayitavyaḥ |
SA01n759:1173: śraddhādiguṇadhanadaridro'yaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā bodhyaṅgaratnakhacite mahati guṇaiśvaryapade sanniveśayitavyaḥ |
SA01n759:1182: yadā khalvayaṃ puruṣatvajātismaratvādiṣu padasthāneṣu niyatībhato bhavati-
SA01n759:1184: ato jñānaprasthāne'smādavagheḥ prabhṛti bodhisattvaḥ anenābhiprāyeṇa paṭhitaḥ |
SA01n759:1188: dviṣatāmapi yaṃ dṛṣṭvā manaḥ sadyaḥ prasīdati ||
SA01n759:1196: yatpunarjanmaśarīraṃ bhagavatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodherāśrayabhūtaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ khacitamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitam,
SA01n759:1197: yatkhalu dṛṣṭvā svavikalpasamutthitapratighadūṣitabuddhī nāmapi mārapakṣyāṇāṃ tīrthyāṇāṃ ca manaḥ prasīdati |
SA01n759:1332: atha tadādyaṃ bodhicittaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dāḍharyeṇa kathamiva draṣṭavyam ?
SA01n759:1346: buddhotpāde naraḥ strī vā tadādyaṃ cittamaśnute ||
SA01n759:1352: manuṣyo vā strī votpādayati nānya iti |
SA01n759:1359: prathame khalvasaṃkhyeye vartamāno bodhisattvaḥ na sarvasmai nāpi sarvaṃ na sarvadā dadāti |
SA01n759:1361: tṛtīye sarvai sarvasmai sarvadā ca prayacchati |
SA01n759:1364: yadā punaḥ prāṇaparityāgenāpi prāṇātipātādiśikṣāpadaṃ na kṣobhayati,
SA01n759:1368: bhagavantaṃ khalu tiṣyaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ ekayā gāthayā ekapādena sthitvā saptāhamabhiṣṭhuvataḥ śākyamunervīyapāramitā paripūrṇā nava ca kalpāḥ pratyudāvartitāḥ |
SA01n759:1375: hiṣkṛtabuddhayaḥ prāhuḥ- “na hi piṭakatraye bhagavatā bodhisattvamārga upadiṣṭaḥ |
SA01n759:1388: dṛśyate, dharmatāṃ ca vilomayati nedaṃ śāstuḥ śāsanam” iti kṛṣṇāpadeśaḥ |
SA01n759:1390: yatkhalu sūtraṃ bhagavatā buddhena bhāṣitaṃ taccaturṣvāgameṣu sthaviramahākāśyapasthavirāṇa(na)
SA01n759:1397: yadi saṃkhyā na vidyate kathaṃ tarhi trayamiti nirdhāryate ?
SA01n759:1398: na khalu saṃkhyā na vidyate | kiṃ tarhi ?
SA01n759:1402: na tu na saṃkhyā vidyata ityetadvivakṣitam |
SA01n759:1403: atha yaṃ śākyamunirbhagavānsamyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvacaryāyāmeṣu triṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu kiyato(tāṃ)
SA01n759:1409: kasya punaḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyasyāvasāne katamo buddho babhūva ?
SA01n759:1414: kasminpunaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhe buddhatve prathamaṃ cittamutpāditam ? śākyamunī |
SA01n759:1415: śākyamunirnāma prathamasyāsaṃkhyeyasyādau babhūva yatra bhagavatā bhārgavabhūtena sukhodakenāṅgaparicaryābhirupasthānaṃ kṛtvā prathamaṃ bodhicittamutpāditamahamapyevaṃ prakāro bhūyāsamiti |
SA01n759:1417: kasminpunaḥ kāle buddhā bhagavanto buddhādityāḥ prādurbhavanti ?
SA01n759:1444: yāvatkhalu kaścidguṇaḥ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya bhagavatā deśito vinirmukta(kti)
SA01n759:1450: tadyathā dvayormātrostulyaṃ vastu tulye kṣetre pratipādayatoścetanāviśeṣādatulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati,
SA01n759:1451: tadvaduttamārthaṃ prārthayamānānāṃ trayāṇāmapi pudgalānāṃ praṇidhānendriyasatataghananirantarabhāvanāprayogapaṭutvābhyāsādiviśeṣāttulye'pi mārge patitānāṃ kaścitphalaviśeṣo bhavati |
SA01n759:1455: tatra bhagavato buddhasya karuṇābhāvanā codrekena vartate bhagavānbuddhaḥ |
SA01n759:1458: kiñca, parato ghoṣamantareṇāpi carame janmani suyoniṣo(śo)
SA01n759:1461: atha tulyāyāṃ vimuktau sthitānāṃ trayāṇāmabhisametṛṇāṃ ko viśeṣaḥ ? taducyate-
SA01n759:1495: evantu varṇayanti-sannikṛṣṭaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sthāpayitvā yatsarvasattvānāṃ bhogaiśvaryādhipatyaphalamiyadekasya puṇyasya pramāṇam ||
SA01n759:1497: tatra kaḥ samāsaḥ kiṃ sādhano vā dānaśabdaḥ,
SA01n759:1503: ko vā dānasya svabhāvaḥ’ iti tatrāpadiśyate-
SA01n759:1509: astu tarhi karmasādhano dīyate taditi dānam |
SA01n759:1534: tatra svahitāyaiva yathā pṛthagjanaḥ parinirvate bhagavati caityāya dadāti parārthameva yathā arhan saṃghāya dadāti,
SA01n759:1541: tatra kathaṃ dātṛviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ vastuviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ kṣetraviśeṣaḥ ?
SA01n759:1545: śraddadhāno dadāti śīlavān kalyāṇadharmā buddhavacanabahuśrutaśca bhavati nirmatsarī muktahastaśca bhavati nirvāṇānuśaṃsaḥ satkṛtya svahastaṃ kālena parānanupahatya dadāti, sa khalu
SA01n759:1555: yadi vastu varṇagandharasasparśasampannaṃ bhavati tadā viśiṣyate |
SA01n759:1563: gatāya dānaṃ datvā śataguṇo vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣi[tavyaḥ syāt] |
SA01n759:1567: “glānāya dānaṃ glānopasthāya kāyadānaṃ śītalikāvardalikādiṣu ca dānam” iti vistaraḥ |
SA01n759:1570: ṣāṃ copakāriṇāṃ ye aṭavīdurgakāntāre bhūtavyasanebhyo nistārayanti |
SA01n759:1572: atha kathaṃ cetanāyāḥ viśeṣo bhavati ? brūmaḥ-
SA01n759:1577: tatrāśayābhiprāyaḥ yathā-evaṃ caivaṃ ca kuryāṃ kariṣyāmīti vā cetanāyā karmapathaṃ samākṣipati |
SA01n759:1587: atha kasya kasmai datvā dānamagryaphalaṃ bhavati ?
SA01n759:1592: yatkhalu bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvahitādhyāśayeṇa dānaṃ dadāti tadagryamuttamārthaphalatvāt bhagavatā'ṣṭau khalu dānānyuktāni sūtre “āsādya dānam |
SA01n759:1601: sūtra uktam-“sāṃcetanikasyāhaṃ karmaṇaḥ kṛtopacitasya nāpratisaṃvedyaphala vadāmi” iti |
SA01n759:1613: tadyathā maitrīvihāriṇo maharṣayo na ca lokaṃ sukhena yojayantyatha cāparimitaṃ puṇyaṃ pratigṛhṇantyevaṃ caityādiṣu tadguṇādhimuktivaśeṇa(na)
SA01n759:1633: etadapi śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu mahābhogatāphalaṃ mokṣaphalaṃ ca,
SA01n759:1640: yatkhalu śīlaṃ dauḥśīlyena na vidūṣitaṃ prāṇātipātādinā'ṣṭaprakāreṇa,
SA01n759:1656: yathā tailaṃ puṣpaiścampakādibhirvāsitaṃ tanmayi bhavati tatsamādhisaṃprayuktaistatsahabhūkaiśca dharmaiścittaṃ bhāvitaṃ vāsitamityucyate,
SA01n759:1663: kiṃ puṇyaṃ kriyā ca vastu ca puṇyakriyāvastu,
SA01n759:1673: yā tatsamutthāpikā cetanā sā puṇyaṃ ca kriyā ca,
SA01n759:1676: bhāvanāmayaṃ maitro puṇyaṃ ca puṇyakriyāśca vastu |
SA01n759:1677: tatsaṃprayuktāyāścetanāyā maitryadhiṣṭhānenābhisaṃskārāṇāṃ maitrīsahabhūcetanā śīlaṃ ca puṇyakriyā ca |
SA01n759:1681: uttamārthaprāptaye khalvāsannatamo heturbhāvaneti kṛtvā bhagavatā bhāvanāmayameva kuśalamūlaṃ visaṃyogāya vidhiyuktamuktam |
SA01n759:1687: puṇyabhāgīyaṃ yena devamanuṣyopapattibījaṃ pratigṛhṇāti maheśākhyaiśca kulamahābhogarūpyacakravartiśakrapuṣpaketubrahmatvādīnāṃ prāptaye phalamākṣipati |
SA01n759:1692: atha yadidaṃ loka ucyate lipimudrāgaṇanāsaṃkhyeti eṣāṃ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ ? ucyate-
SA01n759:1695: tatra tāvallipimudre yogapravartitaṃ kāyakarmasamutthānamiti pañcaskandhātmikā lipiḥ |
SA01n759:1696: yeṇa(na) tu karmaṇā'kṣarāṇi nirvartyante tatkarma lipirityucyate |
SA01n759:1702: yanmanasā saṃkalitaṃ dharmāṇāṃ sā tu saparivārā catuskandhasvabhāveti ||
